text: the year has started with the mildest of
winters and the greatest uncertainty
Afghans have lived through unpredictable
times before this main road running
north was the route taken by Soviet
soldiers when they pulled out in the
winter of 1989 but this moment is
different Mira's o Muhammad fought
against Soviet troops but now he wants
NATO forces to stay our own forces are
still weak he tells me we aren't able to
protect ourselves there's Taliban here
supported he says by neighboring
Pakistan we find Pashtun Yarkon jar
cleaning his assault rifle it's not the
only weapon he has hidden at home there
are gun battles almost every night in
this village of sight hail involving the
Taliban other armed groups or criminals
guwahati could have come up alopecia no
one cares about us that's why we need to
be armed corrupt commanders atticus the
international community doesn't care
about us the government doesn't care
either Afghanistan has changed over the
past decade as easy fruit on has seen it
change for the better yeah I'm a
housewife and mother a good teacher and
two years ago I became the school
principal that's the first woman to take
this job in my village Aziza wants to be
a role model for women here including
her daughters that's why she's decided
to run for a seat on the provincial
council we want to keep the freedoms
we've gained it's not just me that's
worried many people are if the
foreigners lead will be in big trouble
they've supported us in many ways even
paying teachers salaries in Afghanistan
every season has its rituals every year
it's worries but this is a year that
could make all the difference
